title: Canada : violent crime rate 2000 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Violent crime rate. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
Overall Violent crime rate has decreased over the Year.
Violent crime rate is roughly constant from 2000 to 2009, gradually decreasing from 2009 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Violent crime rate, about 1494.21 was reported at Year 2000
Minimum Violent crime rate about 1044.23 was reached at Year 2014
